sn1.74:2.4: The commentary says this refers to a child who testifies on one’s behalf in a court of law. But I think it is about the joy a parent feels when they hear their child speak for the first time. Śatapatha Brāhmaṇa 7.4.2.38 says, “children utter speech” (prajā vācam pravadanti) when one year old.
